oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Brown County Jamboree - Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys - 1966-10-31
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various performances from the Brown County Jamboree Bluegrass Festival, located in Bean Blossom, Indiana, featuring Bill Monroe (performer) and his Bluegrass Boys, Pete Rowan, Richard Greene, Jim Monroe, and Lamar Grier. Recorded on October 31, 1966.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bill Monroe; Bluegrass Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) [Unidentified] talks about upcoming performances in Beanblossom, and introduces Bill Monroe -- (01:51) When The Watermelons Are Smiling On The Vine (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (02:24) Monroe talks about playing in Beanblossom in the past, and introduces the band -- (03:43) Panhandle Country (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (06:05) Sunny Side Of the Mountain (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (09:05) Monroe introduces the next tune - (09:14) Walls Of Time (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (13:10) Monroe introduces the next tune -- (13:29) Bluegrass Breakdown (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (16:38) Monroe introduces the next tune -- (16:48) Molly And Tenbrooks (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (19:09) Monroe introduces the next tune -- (19:15) You'll Find Her Name Written There (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (22:42) Monroe takes requests from the audience -- (22:51) Breakin' In A Brand New Pair Of Shoes (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (25:50) Monroe introduces the next tune -- (26:00) Blue Moon Of Kentucky (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (28:05) Monroe thanks the audience and introduces the next tune -- (26:26) Roanoke (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (30:53) Toy Heart (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (33:33) Bluegrass Special (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (37:05) Monroe introduces the next tune -- California Blues (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (39:32) Monroe introduces the next tune -- (40:49) Uncle Pen (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (43:37) A Beautiful Life (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996; Bill Monroe and the Bluegrass Boys (Musical group); Brown County Jamboree; Bean Blossom (Brown County, Ind.);
